Sept. 18, 1954 D Bletchley Brass Band Contest (Championship Section)
Bletchley Brass Band Contest (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Bletchley Brass Band Contest bletchley-brass-band-contest-championship-section
Oberon [unknown arranger]
Bletchley Assembly Hall, Bletchley, Buckinghamshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £25, 2nd £15, 3rd £10, 8th annual contest organised by Bletchley Town Band. 5 bands competed.
March 15, 2013, 8:28 a.m. April 17, 2019, 8:34 p.m.

3 Croydon Brass Band W. B. Wesley Johnstone
